00038 #include "egs_beam_source.h"
00039 #include "egs_input.h"
00040 #include "egs_functions.h"
00041 #include "egs_library.h"
00042 #include "egs_application.h"

00044 #include <cstdlib>
00045 #include <cstring>

00047 #define STRINGIFY(s) HELP_S(s)
00048 #define HELP_S(s) #s
00049 #define F77_NAME(fname,FNAME) STRINGIFY(F77_OBJ(fname,FNAME))
00050 #define F77_NAME_(fname,FNAME) STRINGIFY(F77_OBJ_(fname,FNAME))
00051 
00052 EGS_BeamSource::EGS_BeamSource(EGS_Input *input, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00053     EGS_BaseSource(input,f) {
00054     n_reuse_photon = 0; n_reuse_electron = 0;
00055     i_reuse_photon = 0; i_reuse_electron = 0;
00056     is_valid = false; lib = 0;
00057     Xmin = -1e30; Xmax = 1e30; Ymin = -1e30; Ymax = 1e30;
00058     wmin = -1e30; wmax = 1e30;
00059     string beam_code; int err1 = input->getInput("beam code",beam_code);
00060     string pegs_file; int err2 = input->getInput("pegs file",pegs_file);
00061     string input_file; int err3 = input->getInput("input file",input_file);
00062     if( err1 ) egsWarning("EGS_BeamSource: no 'beam code' input\n");
00063     if( err2 ) egsWarning("EGS_BeamSource: no 'pegs file' input\n");
00064     if( err3 ) egsWarning("EGS_BeamSource: no 'input file' input\n");
00065     if( err1 || err2 || err3 ) return;
00066     char *egs_home = getenv("EGS_HOME");
00067     if( !egs_home ) {
00068         egsWarning("EGS_BeamSource: EGS_HOME is not defined\n"); return;
00069     }
00070     char *hen_house = getenv("HEN_HOUSE");
00071     if( !hen_house ) {
00072         egsWarning("EGS_BeamSource: HEN_HOUSE is not defined\n"); return;
00073     }
00074     string path = egs_home; path += "bin/"; path += CONFIG_NAME;
00075     lib = new EGS_Library(beam_code.c_str(),path.c_str());
00076 
00077     InitFunction init = (InitFunction)
00078         lib->resolve(F77_NAME_(beamlib_init,BEAMLIB_INIT));
00079     finish = (FinishFunction)
00080         lib->resolve(F77_NAME_(beamlib_finish,BEAMLIB_FINISH));
00081     sample = (SampleFunction)
00082         lib->resolve(F77_NAME_(beamlib_sample,BEAMLIB_SAMPLE));
00083     MaxEnergyFunction maxenergy = (MaxEnergyFunction)
00084         lib->resolve(F77_NAME_(beamlib_max_energy,BEAMLIB_MAX_ENERGY));
00085     if( !init )
00086         egsWarning("EGS_BeamSource: failed to resolve the init function\n");
00087     if( !sample )
00088         egsWarning("EGS_BeamSource: failed to resolve the sample function\n");
00089     if( !finish )
00090         egsWarning("EGS_BeamSource: failed to resolve the finish function\n");
00091     if( !maxenergy )
00092     egsWarning("EGS_BeamSource: failed to resolve the max. energy function\n");
00093     if( !init || !sample || !finish || !maxenergy ) return;
00094 
00095     int ipar=0, ilog=6;
00096     EGS_Application *app = EGS_Application::activeApplication();
00097     if( app ) ipar = app->getIparallel();
00098 
00099     init(&ipar,&ilog,hen_house,egs_home,beam_code.c_str(),
00100             pegs_file.c_str(),input_file.c_str(),
00101             strlen(hen_house), strlen(egs_home),
00102             beam_code.size(),pegs_file.size(),input_file.size());
00103     maxenergy(&Emax);
00104 
00105     is_valid = true;
00106 
00107     vector<EGS_Float> cutout;
00108     int err = input->getInput("cutout",cutout);
00109     if( !err && cutout.size() == 4 )
00110         setCutout(cutout[0],cutout[1],cutout[2],cutout[3]);
00111     vector<string> ptype;
00112     ptype.push_back("electrons"); ptype.push_back("photons");
00113     ptype.push_back("positrons"); ptype.push_back("all");
00114     ptype.push_back("charged");
00115     particle_type = input->getInput("particle type",ptype,3)-1;
00116 
00117     vector<EGS_Float> wwindow;
00118     err = input->getInput("weight window",wwindow);
00119     if( !err && wwindow.size() == 2 ) {
00120         wmin = wwindow[0]; wmax = wwindow[1];
00121     }
00122 
00123     int ntmp;
00124     err = input->getInput("reuse photons",ntmp);
00125     if( !err && ntmp > 1 ) n_reuse_photon = ntmp;
00126     err = input->getInput("reuse electrons",ntmp);
00127     if( !err && ntmp > 1 ) n_reuse_electron = ntmp;
00128 
00129     description = beam_code; description += "(";
00130     description += input_file; description += ") simulation source";
00131 }
00132 
00133 EGS_I64 EGS_BeamSource::getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *, int &q,
00134     int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt, EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u) {
00135     if( n_reuse_photon > 0 && i_reuse_photon < n_reuse_photon ) {
00136         q = q_save; latch = latch_save; E = E_save; wt = wt_save;
00137         x = x_save; u = u_save; ++i_reuse_photon;
00138         return count;
00139     }
00140     if( n_reuse_electron > 0 && i_reuse_electron < n_reuse_electron) {
00141         q = q_save; latch = latch_save; E = E_save; wt = wt_save;
00142         x = x_save; u = u_save; ++i_reuse_electron;
00143         return count;
00144     }
00145     EGS_Float te,tx,ty,tz,tu,tv,tw,twt;
00146     int tq,tlatch,tiphat; bool ok;
00147     do {
00148         sample(&te,&tx,&ty,&tz,&tu,&tv,&tw,&twt,&tq,&tlatch,&count,&tiphat);
00149         //egsInformation("EGS_BeamSource::getNextParticle: Got E=%g q=%d wt=%g"
00150         //    " x=(%g,%g,%g) latch=%d count=%lld\n",te,tq,twt,tx,ty,tz,
00151         //    tlatch,count);
00152         if(tq) te -= 0.5110034;
00153         ok = true;
00154         if( te > Emax ) { ok = false; } //egsInformation("Emax rejection\n"); }
00155         if( particle_type < 2 && tq != particle_type ) {
00156             ok = false; } // egsInformation("charge rejection"); }
00157         if( particle_type == 3 && !tq ) ok = false;
00158         if( tx < Xmin || tx > Xmax || ty < Ymin || ty > Ymax ) {
00159             ok = false; } // egsInformation("cutout rejection\n"); }
00160         if( twt < wmin || twt > wmax ) {
00161             ok = false; // egsInformation("weight rejection\n");
00162         }
00163     } while ( !ok );
00164     i_reuse_electron = n_reuse_electron;
00165     i_reuse_photon = n_reuse_photon;
00166     //egsInformation("returning particle\n");
00167     E = te; q = tq;
00168     latch = 0; //latch = tlatch;
00169     bool save_it = false;
00170     if( n_reuse_photon > 1 && !tq ) {
00171         twt /= n_reuse_photon; i_reuse_photon = 1; save_it = true;
00172     }
00173     if( n_reuse_electron > 1 && tq ) {
00174         twt /= n_reuse_electron; i_reuse_electron = 1; save_it = true;
00175     }
00176     wt = twt;
00177     x = EGS_Vector(tx,ty,tz); u = EGS_Vector(tu,tv,tw);
00178     if( save_it ) {
00179         q_save = tq; latch_save = 0;
00180         E_save = E; wt_save = twt;
00181         x_save = x; u_save = u;
00182     }
00183     return count;
00184 }
00185 
00186 EGS_BeamSource::~EGS_BeamSource() {
00187     if( lib ) {
00188         if( is_valid ) finish();
00189         delete lib;
00190     }
00191 }

00195 EGS_BEAM_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_BaseSource* createSource(EGS_Input *input,
00196         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) { return
00197     createSourceTemplate<EGS_BeamSource>(input,f,"beam source");
00198 }
